EmailTemplate.name: CwK-ePCR.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Monthly Customer Service Webinars: REGISTER NOW FOR COFFEE WITH KELLY - ePCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Coffee with Kelly - ePCR Every Second Wednesday of the Month
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS ePCR Customer}} -
Register now for complimentary, monthly training on your TriTech EMS ePCR software. By registering now, you'll automatically receive invites to the live monthly trainings, as well as links to the recordings if you miss the live event. These half-hour tips and sips will help you keep your software skills and industry knowledge fresh!
Don’t miss the next session – register now to make sure you’re signed up for the live monthly sessions where you can ask questions and get your specific questions answered. <http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-ePCR_Registration.html>
If you cannot view the button above, please copy and paste this link into a browser window: http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-ePCR_Registration.html
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing or ePCR cloud-based software - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927. Training Information: Complimentary Monthly Customer Service Webinar Series Every Second Wednesday of the Month 11:30 AM Eastern | 10:30 AM Central | 9:30 AM Mountain | 8:30 AM Pacific
All you need is an internet connection to join. Listen through your computer speakers, or dial in through a telephone. Every live session includes a question-answer session where you get your specific questions answered.
